alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Musselshell; Northern Stillwater; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, southwestern Musselshell, northwestern Yellowstone and southern Golden Valley Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 529 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles north of Columbus, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ryegate, Broadview, Lavina, Franklin, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge and Rapelje. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
